mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advance_tickets (adminId, advanceTicketNumber, used, expiresAt, issuedAt) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{advanceTicketNumber}, #{used}, #{expiresAt}, #{issuedAt})

INSERT INTO events (adminId, eventCategory, title, content, thumbnail, startDate, endDate, status) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{eventCategory}, #{title}, #{content}, #{thumbnail}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status})
